statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE date_joined > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email, date_joined FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE date_joined > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY email;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE date_joined > '2020-01-01' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email, date_joined FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email, profile_pic FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM recipe_comments WHERE recipe_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, comment_text, date_posted FROM recipe_comments ORDER BY date_posted ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profiles WHERE username ILIKE 'a%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipe_comments WHERE recipe_id = 123 ORDER BY date_posted DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, count(comment_id) AS num_comments FROM recipe_comments GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY num_comments DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT recipe_id, trend_type, trend_score FROM PopularRecipeTrends ORDER BY trend_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, bio FROM UserProfiles WHERE bio IS NOT NULL;
SELECT recipe_id, trend_type FROM PopularRecipeTrends WHERE trend_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT recipe_id, trend_type, trend_score FROM PopularRecipeTrends WHERE trend_score > 50 ORDER BY trend_score DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT username, email FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT recipe_id, COUNT(comment_id) AS total_comments FROM RecipeComments GROUP BY recipe_id HAVING total_comments > 5;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT recipe_name, category, rating FROM popular_recipes WHERE views > 1000 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT comment_text, date_posted FROM recipe_comments WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY date_posted DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_score FROM recipe_trends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_score DESC, trend_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY date_registered DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT recipe_name, category, rating FROM popular_recipes WHERE views > 1000 AND category = 'Desserts' ORDER BY rating DESC, date_posted ASC;

SELECT user_id, username, email, age FROM user_profiles INNER JOIN recipe_comments ON user_profiles.user_id = recipe_comments.user_id WHERE comment_text LIKE '%delicious%' AND date_posted > '2021-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM popular_recipes WHERE rating >= 4.5 AND views < 500;
SELECT recipe_name, trend_name FROM popular_recipes JOIN recipe_trends ON popular_recipes.recipe_id = recipe_trends.recipe_id WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, likes_count FROM PopularRecipes WHERE likes_count > 100;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_description FROM PopularRecipes WHERE recipe_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, recipe_id FROM UserFavorites WHERE user_id = 3;

SELECT recipe_name, recipe_description, likes_count FROM PopularRecipes WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, recipe_id, comment_text FROM RecipeComments WHERE comment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, recipe_id FROM UserFavorites JOIN RecipeTags ON UserFavorites.recipe_id = RecipeTags.recipe_id WHERE RecipeTags.tag_name = 'Dessert';
